title.native: スキップとローファー

description:
This country girl is ready for the big city! Well, at least she thought she was. Mitsumi’s dream is to attend a prestigious school and make the world a better place. But when she finally gets to Tokyo, it turns out she isn’t exactly prepared for city life. Luckily, she runs into Shima, a sweet and handsome classmate who becomes her first friend! Can she make it in Tokyo with Shima by her side?

(Source: Crunchyroll)
hashtag: #スキップとローファー #スキロー
synonyms: จังหวะวัยรุ่น ว้าวุ่นหัวใจ

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Acting
tags.description: Centers around actors or the acting industry.

tags.name: Transgender
tags.description: Features a character whose gender identity differs from the sex they were assigned at birth.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Coastal
tags.description: Story prominently takes place near the beach or around a coastal area/town. Setting is near the ocean.

node.description:
__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/cocoa2448)__ | __[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/takatsuguw)__ | __[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIHIFDHvA6loFvr1GwxCITA/videos)__

__Birthplace:__ Sakura City, Chiba Prefecture, Japan
__Residency:__ Meguro City, Tokyo, Japan

__Takatsugu Wakabayashi__ is a Japanese composer and arranger, who mainly composes music for the game industry.
Started off as a production manager at [Bones](https://anilist.co/studio/4/).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/東潤一)

Founder and representative director of Studio Easter.

**Height:** 150cm

[Website](https://rikakoaida.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Rikako_Aida) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/aida_rikako_/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfwvbv52NmPIHMIVDp3Jqrw)

Rikako Aida is a Japanese actress, voice actress and singer from Tokyo, Japan. She is best known for her role as Riko Sakurauchi from Love Live! Sunshine!!. She is affiliated with Ken Production.

On August 21, 2024, she made her VTuber debut as Rikyako (りきゃこ). 

**Non-anime roles:**
• Merlyn - Memento Mori (VG)
• Desert Flannel - Reverse: 1999 (VG)
• Quartz - Arknights (VG)
• CAWS - Girls' Frontline (VG)
• EM-2 - Girls' Frontline (VG)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/haaagin) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/87_hagi)

Affiliated with [CloverWorks](https://anilist.co/studio/6222/CloverWorks). Debuted as a character designer on [Wonder Egg Priority](https://anilist.co/anime/124845/).

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/andrerinaldidub/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/andrerinaldidub) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/andrerinaldidub) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@andrerinaldidub) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJB9-DmISWwZaBMmDqK7i2A) | [Site Web](https://www.andrerinaldi.com)

André Augusto Rinaldi is a Brazilian actor, voice actor and dubbing director. He currently directs at Grupo Macias and at DuBrasil. He is the cousin of the voice actor [Fabricio Rinaldi](https://anilist.co/staff/209058/).
